CustomField.description: Exclusion of limitation of liability for anything other than: 1) Gross Negligence, 2) Wilful Misconduct, 3) Direct damages due to infringement of either party's IP rights, 4) any other liability that can't lawfully be excluded.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Exclusion of limitation of liability for anything other than: 1) Gross Negligence, 2) Wilful Misconduct, 3) Direct damages due to infringement of either party's IP rights, 4) any other liability that can't lawfully be excluded.
CustomField.label: Exclusion of limitation of liability
